member.name: WS_CUSTOM_CERT_CREDENTIAL
member.summary: The type for specifying a certificate credential that is to be supplied by a callback to the application. This callback is invoked to get the certificate during on the client side and during on the server side. It is always invoked .

member.name: WS_CUSTOM_CERT_CREDENTIAL.credential
member.summary: The base type from which this type and all other certificate credential types derive.

member.name: WS_CUSTOM_CERT_CREDENTIAL.getCertCallback
member.summary: The Callback to get the certificate.

member.name: WS_CUSTOM_CERT_CREDENTIAL.getCertCallbackState
member.summary: The state to be passed when invoking the callback.
